attributes.long-description:
A puzzle-platformer of cataclysmic proportions, starring an ornery blob with an insatiable appetite. Begin the game a tiny captive carnivore, finish a city devouring giant. Gain freakish new abilities including magnetism, telekinesis, and rocket power. Platforming has never been this viscous, nor this various. 24 expansive single player campaign levels, PLUS top-down bonus stages featuring tilt controls. Retro style, crazy environments, leaderboards, trophies, native 1080p graphics. Consume everything, regret nothing!

The Delicious Bundle Includes:
- * PlayStation®3 system and PlayStation®Vita system versions of the game *
- Official Game Soundtrack (remastered)
- Amazing ''Growing Pains'' Dynamic Theme
- Wacky Avatar Packs

- 1 player
- Network Features
- Minimum Save Size: 370 KB
- DUALSHOCK®3
- SIXAXIS Motion Sensitive
- HDTV screen resolution: 720p, 1080i, 1080p

Software subject to license (us.playstation.com/softwarelicense). Online activity subject to Terms of Services and User Agreement (www.playstationnetwork.com/terms-of-service). One time license fee entitles play on up to 2 PlayStation® 3 systems and 3 PlayStation® Vita systems activated by this account.

'Tales from Space: Mutant Blobs Attack' © 2013 DrinkBox Studios Inc. All Rights Reserved. Developed and Published by DrinkBox Studios Inc.
